patthana16.84:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasappītiko
patthana16.84:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.84:1.1_2: nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.84:1.1_3: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappītiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappītiko
patthana16.84:1.1_4: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.84:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naappītiko
patthana16.84:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.84:2.1_2: naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.84:2.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naappītiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naappītiko ca dhammā
patthana16.84:2.1_4: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
